args.content:
import Mathlib
open Complex
open Complex ContinuousLinearMap
open scoped ComplexConjugate

/-- Suppose f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic. Show that f is conformal at a point z0 if and only if f'(z0) ‚â† 0. -/
theorem conformal_at_iff_deriv_ne_zero {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} {z‚ÇÄ : ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚ÑÇ f z‚ÇÄ) :
  ConformalAt f z‚ÇÄ ‚Üî deriv f z‚ÇÄ ‚â† 0 := by sorry
